channel.title: Join a server
channel.description: Hello im new to moparscape and I was woundering how do i join a server that i can see, talk and play with other players? I am able to log in but im by my self and it gets kinda boring. Plz help

item.title: Join a server
item.dc:creator: @rw_master rw master
item.description:
@rw_master wrote:

http://www.hamachi.cc/download/ download hamachi go on join server if the the server says that it requires hamachi

Read full topic

item.title: Join a server
item.dc:creator: @killerclown58 killerclown58
item.description:
@killerclown58 wrote:

Another question. after i added the server ip and port number i go to log in, but it wont let me log in it says “error connecting to server. must be down. click cancel then start server to make your own.” i click on start server then it lets me log in but im by my self

Read full topic

item.title: Join a server
item.dc:creator: @GuNtRiX GuNtRiX
item.description:
@GuNtRiX wrote:

Or use this
http://codefasga.com/status.php
Or
http://aahost.nozonenet.com/serverstatus/serverstatus.php
To see which servers are online

Read full topic

item.title: Join a server
item.dc:creator: @sweetgirl40 sweetgirl40
item.description:
@sweetgirl40 wrote:

You have to download moparscape webclient, and then just go to server advertisments and put in the ip and the port off forms, ill get link for you.

Download this.

http://moparisthebest.com/moparscape.html

After that go play, remember you can use any username or pass so dont put in your runescape username and pass
You could get hacked that way.

Read full topic
